name: Escape from PolyU
description:
WARNING:  FLASHING LIGHTS (made worse by my lack of compression or preloading of images 🙁)

🔉🔉🔉
There's an issue with the sound button - it's directly above the animated start button  (⮋),  but does not show up until hovered. Turn it on for best experience :)

There's 4 'endings', but you can always go back down.

(backup GitHub download link in case of any issues: https://github.com/AmiciA/escapepolyu/blob/main/escapepolyu.zip)
